definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lie stretched out, lie down (Aram. form of [[רָבַץ]] (q.v.); NH [[רבע]] usu. of copulation, chiefly unnatural; yet cf. also Sab. [[רבע]] abide, encamp, settle, DHM:ZMG xxix (1875), 593, Ar. raba9 abide, dwell)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: only Inf.: sf. [[רִבְעִי]] Ps 139:3 my lying down (for repose, opp.[[אָרְחִי]]); elsewh. (H) for copulation (woman with beast) [[עְרִבְעָה אׂתָהּ]] Le 20:16, but read [[אִתָּהּ]] (sf. of beast) Dr-Wh Kö:Synt. 226 e, cf. Bae Berthol (and Dr:2Sa 13:14); [[לְרִבְעָהּ]] 2Sa 18:23, rd. [[לְרִבְעָה]] (compl. om.; v. id.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[בְּהֶמְתְּךָ לאׂ תַרְבִּיעַ]] [[כִּלְאַיִם]] Le 19:19 (H) thy cattle thou shalt not cause to (let) lie down (i.e. breed) in two kinds.
